snippet: Rory McIlroy was chosen as the European Tour’s player of the year, capping a season in which he won two majors and the Ryder Cup.
abstract: Rory McIllroy is named European Tour's golfer of the year.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy was chosen as the European Tour’s player of the year, capping a season in which he won two majors and the Ryder Cup.

headline.main: McIlroy Is European Tour’s Top Player
headline.print_headline: McIlroy Is European Tour’s Top Player
